title: Who’s the Competitive One Now?
detail_text: <:th_ch0204/>*Sigh*.... You’re really good at dancing, huh, You-chan. Your dancing has sharpness, or rather....  it’s so full of life that I can’t help but look<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Eeh!? I-, is that so? Ehehe…. You’re embarrassing me. The rest of Aqours gets better and better with each practice, so I can’t lose to them<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>….Your improvements are also impressive…. Somehow, I’m starting to get restless<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>You-chan, would you do a dance battle with me at the arcade?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Like you did with Eli-san a while back, Karin-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>You knew? That makes things easier. We’ll decide the winner by the reaction of the spectators around us. How about it? Doesn’t it sound interesting?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>It can’t be helped~, it’s a duel then<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>My, what a good expression. You’re quite competitive, aren’t you, You-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Only as much as you are, Karin-san♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
